Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Curtis L Hosford
Reviews.Content: I have found this unit barely usable. It's noisey fan is disturbing since it has to be on 24/7 for my security cameras. I haven't been able to get it to record, connect to my computer, or connecdt to it online as it is advertised. As a security officer, I work with security cameras and recording devices and this one is low on my list of exceptable products. Someone with more time might like it.

ProductInfo.Features:
8 CH H.264 compression triplex real time stand alone DVR, with 2 TB SATA hard drive. 8 channel video and 4 channel audio inputs
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation
3.5" SATA hard drive (HDD). Support iPhone Google Phone
Support daylight saving time, PIP and EZOOM function
Support the live video, parameter setting and copy playback video via network
